entries.sourceEnglish: EPISODE FOUR
THE PATH
Press X to Begin

entries.context: Black screen. Echoes of dialogue from back inside the Mine.
entries.sourceEnglish: Sick Ass? Are you with me?

entries.context: Work whistle. Fade up to Sick Ass outside of the Mines.
entries.sourceEnglish: *COUGH*
Hey sis'—it's BREAK TIME!
Wanna play HIDE AND SEEK?
*COUGH*
*COUGH*
Yes? GREAT!
*COUGH COUGH*
*COUGH COUGH*
No? Ha ha. Don't worry, I'll go easy on you.
I'll start COUNTING!
30 SECONDS!
Ready or not—HERE I COME!

entries.context: Kick Ass always finds Sick Ass.
entries.sourceEnglish: FOUND YOU!
That was awesome, WASN'T IT? Let's play AGAIN!

entries.context: Kick Ass always finds Sick Ass.
entries.sourceEnglish: You're my sister and I'll always FIND YOU.
Even if you're down in the deepest corner of the Mine!
Or in the FARTHEST CITY!
Or somewhere ELSE ENTIRELY!!

entries.context:
Dialogue for when Sick Ass coughs.
// Sick Ass wanders around the first floor of the Mine. She is slowly dying.
entries.sourceEnglish: *COUGH COUGH*

entries.context: Dialogue for when Sick Ass tries to exit.
Dialogue for when Sick Ass tries to exit.
NPC dialogue option. No particular order for when you talk to someone.
entries.sourceEnglish: Hey Sick, you're supposed to be MELLOWING out!
Don't go too FAR!

entries.context: NPC dialogue option. No particular order for when you talk to someone.
entries.sourceEnglish: Lie down. We need your strength.
Rest, Comrade.

entries.context: NPC dialogue option. No particular order for when you talk to someone.
entries.sourceEnglish: Oh Sick, I wish you would get b-b-b...
b-b-b-b...
b-b-b-b-b...
...better.
If Trusty were around, she'd by right b-b-by your side.

entries.context: NPC dialogue option. No particular order for when you talk to someone.
entries.sourceEnglish: Oh Sick... you don't look like you have much time left...
*whimper*

entries.context: NPC dialogue option. No particular order for when you talk to someone.
entries.sourceEnglish: Why did Hard Ass cross the road?
Oh, oops. I guess now's not the time...
You know, Sick, you're the only here who can take a joke.

entries.context: NPC dialogue option. No particular order for when you talk to someone.
entries.sourceEnglish: Can I git ya some water, Comrade?
Heck, yer not lookin' so hot.

entries.context: NPC dialogue option. No particular order for when you talk to someone.
entries.sourceEnglish: Fear not Comrade, I'm confident that the Gods are watching over you.

entries.context: Repeater line. Depending on what Old Ass said in Episode 1.
entries.sourceEnglish: Remember what Old Ass said: Ass Power!

entries.context: Repeater line. Depending on what Old Ass said in Episode 1.
entries.sourceEnglish: Remember what Old Ass said: Don't be scared!

entries.context: NPC dialogue option. No particular order for when you talk to someone.
entries.sourceEnglish: If I had any of my rations left I'd share them with you.
I'm sorry, there's nothing left.

entries.context: NPC dialogue option. No particular order for when you talk to someone.
entries.sourceEnglish: Golly! You must be feeling better already!
You look ready to hop back to work!

entries.context: Dialogue option 1.1. // After Sick dies, the Player takes over as Kick Ass who needs to find his sister in the Mine.
entries.sourceEnglish: @#$%&! You're to blame for all of our SUFFERING, Hard Ass!
@#$%&! You're to blame for all of our SUFFERING, Hard Ass!

entries.context: Dialogue option 1.2. // After Sick dies, the Player takes over as Kick Ass who needs to find his sister in the Mine.
entries.sourceEnglish: @#$%&! We can't keep going out in the RAIN on these MISSIONS.
@#$%&! We can't keep going out in the RAIN on these MISSIONS.
Sick's getting WORSE.
Comrade, she will be fine. We leave at dawn for the next mission.
WHAT?! She needs REST!
We need all three of us.
We have not finished what we started.
We've had ENOUGH!
We don't want to play your GAME ANYMORE!
There is no going back after what we have done.
The truth will tear the Herd in two.
I DON'T CARE about the Herd!
All I care about is—
Sick?
SICK?!

entries.context: Kick Ass goes to find Sick Ass.
entries.sourceEnglish: Sick—where are you?!

entries.context: NPC dialogue repeater option. No particular order for when you talk to someone.
entries.sourceEnglish: "You only hit rock bottom when you quit."

entries.context:
NPC dialogue repeater option. No particular order for when you talk to someone.
// This option is if they talked with Sick.
entries.sourceEnglish: Sick looks like she's feeling better! I think everything's going to be alright!

entries.context:
NPC dialogue repeater option. No particular order for when you talk to someone.
// This option is if they did NOT talk with Sick.
entries.sourceEnglish: How's Sick feeling today? You two make such a good pair!

entries.context:
NPC dialogue repeater option. No particular order for when you talk to someone.
// This option is if they talked with Sick.
entries.sourceEnglish: You and I can sit Vigil together. I don't have my candle though...

entries.context:
NPC dialogue repeater option. No particular order for when you talk to someone.
// This option is if they did NOT talk with Sick.
entries.sourceEnglish: Today is just as dark as yesterday and will be just as dark as tomorrow.

entries.context:
NPC dialogue repeater option. No particular order for when you talk to someone.
// This option is if they talked with Sick.
entries.sourceEnglish: You look like you could use some water too!

entries.context:
NPC dialogue repeater option. No particular order for when you talk to someone.
// This option is if they did NOT talk with Sick.
entries.sourceEnglish: Dangnabbit! I'm goin' stir crazy down here!

entries.context:
NPC dialogue repeater option. No particular order for when you talk to someone.
// This option is if they talked with Sick.
entries.sourceEnglish: I hope Sick found some extra rations.

entries.context:
NPC dialogue repeater option. No particular order for when you talk to someone.
// This option is if they did NOT talk with Sick.
entries.sourceEnglish: This is a difficult time, Comrade. I'm here for you.

entries.context: NPC dialogue repeater option. No particular order for when you talk to someone.
entries.sourceEnglish: I hope Sick is feeling b-b-b...
b-b-b-b...
b-b-b-b-b...
...better.

entries.context:
NPC dialogue repeater option. No particular order for when you talk to someone.
// This option is if they talked with Sick.
entries.sourceEnglish: Hold tight, Comrade. I trust the Gods will see how special Sick Ass is when they meet her.

entries.context:
NPC dialogue repeater option. No particular order for when you talk to someone.
// This option is if they did NOT talk with Sick.
entries.sourceEnglish: Have you seen {$NewName}? I can't find her anywhere.

entries.context: NPC dialogue repeater option. No particular order for when you talk to someone.
entries.sourceEnglish: If we had some Human medicine maybe Sick would get better.

entries.context: Dialogue for when Kick Ass tries to exit.
entries.sourceEnglish: Sick?!—@#$%&!—I don't think she'd have gone this way...

entries.context: Dialogue for when Kick Ass tries to exit.
entries.sourceEnglish: I don't think Sick would have gone back out into the rain...

entries.context: Kick finds Sick Ass's lifeless body.
entries.sourceEnglish: I FOUND YOU!
Sick...? SICK?!
HEEEEEHAWWWW!
REPEATER
REPEATER
REPEATER
REPEATER

entries.context:
The Herd gathers to see the commotion.
Kick Ass, standing over his sister's body, is incensed and rageful.
entries.sourceEnglish: HEEEE—@#$%&!—HAWWW!!
THIS IS YOUR FAULT HARD ASS!
EVERYONE deserves to know why Sick is DEAD.
What REALLY happened on our "scavenging" missions...
What Hard Ass FORCED us to do...
...to the Humans.
Humans?! Are you joking?!
They've been—TRYING TO RETURN—to Fannyside ever since the Fire.
Hard Ass forced us to keep it a SECRET.
Because you'd CRAWL BACK to the Humans just to stay alive.
But LOOK AT US NOW—dying anyway!
Is this some kind of twisted joke, Hard Ass?!
You begged me to rescue the Humans.
But when I went to save them from the Fire, the Humans were ready to kill me to save themselves.
They revealed their true nature.
That day, I learned what it will take for us to survive.
The only option left for us is Revolution.
We must become our own Masters.
Without Humans, we'll never work again!
We're all gonna die because of you, Hard Ass!
Wrong.
Asses don't require Humans to work.
Living is work enough.
We're free.
Ha! Free to suffer and starve!
You'd have us work to live—but I'd rather LIVE to WORK.
That's right—I'm DONE! Time for a new Plan!
ONE. We leave to find more Humans.
TWO. We DON'T KILL the Humans.\n
THREE. We convince the Humans to give up their Machines, we don't die in this Hellhole, and we get our JOBS BACK.
EASY.
Who's coming with me?!
Comrades, I'm staying here with my Foal where we belong.
I know Old Ass dreamed of a world where Asses and Humans worked together again...
But if what Hard Ass says is true, then it's too late.
Old Ass's dream is dead.
The only thing we have left is each other and our faith that the Gods have a plan.
Any Ass who leaves, betrays the Herd.
Any Ass who STAYS is a MURDERER!
WHO'S WITH ME?!
Come on...
Someone—?
Anyone—?
—won't any Ass step forward?!
If Trusty were here, none of this would have hap-p-p-p-pened.
...I'll come...
Fine...ONE. Anyone else?
The Humans may have belittled us, but that's no reason for such heavy violence.
{vpunch=100,0.75}I'm leaving with Smart Ass too.
TWO!
AND A HALF!
...I have blood on my hooves.
You're right, Smart Ass—this place will be THE DEATH of us.
I'll come with you... IF YOU'LL HAVE ME.
I suppose it could be strategic to bring you with us...
But you have to swear that you won't hurt another Human ever again.
I SWEAR on the body of my SISTER—I will never hurt another Human again.
That's THREE and a half. Who else?
Ah heck...
Nice Ass what are you going to do?
Golly. Leave Fannyside? But this is our home. I can't just leave!
Then heck, I’m staying too!
Sad Ass? Comrade? What's your decision?

entries.context: Branch 2.1. Sad Ass is going to STAY on the Farm.
entries.sourceEnglish: Someone once said to me, we have to honour the legacy of those who came before us.
So I think it's about time I pick myself up and try to live the life that Lazy wanted.
I'm staying here.
Whatever. Let's go!
Comrades, if you go I can't protect you—
Shut it, Hard Ass!

entries.context:
Some of the Herd head towards the door.
We're left with Kick over Sick's body.
entries.sourceEnglish: Come on Kick and Big.... and Slow—we're outta this Hellhole! EASY.

entries.context: Branch 2.2. Sad Ass is going to LEAVE the Farm.
entries.sourceEnglish: Someone once said to me, that if you aren't doing something that brings you joy, you should do something different.
So I think it’s time for me to get a fresh start.
I'll come with you Smart Ass.
FOUR! Let's go!
Comrades, if you go I can't protect you—
Shut it, Hard Ass!

entries.context:
Some of the Herd head towards the door.
We're left with Kick over Sick's body.
entries.sourceEnglish: Come on Kick, Big, Sad... and Slow—we're outta this Hellhole! EASY.
Revolution requires sacrifice.
Fuck your sacrifices!
Sick has been ill a long time, Comrade.
And now she's dead because of your stupid Revolution!

entries.context: In the flashback, we see a violent scene play out.
entries.sourceEnglish: We would hide along the Highway and wait for a Car-Machine...
*COUGH COUGH*

entries.context: Hard Ass viciously beats the Farmer.
entries.sourceEnglish: When the Humans arrived...

entries.context: Kick Ass helps deliver the finishing blow. There is blood everywhere.
entries.sourceEnglish: He made me HELP while Sick Ass kept watch.
It would take forever for the rain to wash the BLOOD off.

entries.context: Kick Ass performs the Song of Ascension for Sick Ass's soul to be sent to the Astral Plane.
entries.sourceEnglish: Goodbye, my Comrade, my SISTER.
I hope you make it to the Astral Plane.
And when your Soul gets reassigned—I'LL FIND YOU.
IN CASE OF EMERGENCY, PLEASE CALL
COAL OR NOT COAL?
MISSING

entries.context: NPC dialogue option. No particular order for when you talk to someone.
entries.sourceEnglish: You're being emotional. The Humans will toss you aside the first chance they get.
Just go.

entries.context: NPC dialogue option. No particular order for when you talk to someone.
entries.sourceEnglish: Comrade, is this what Sick would have wanted?
It's going to break {$NewName}'s heart to know you're all gone.

entries.context: NPC dialogue option. No particular order for when you talk to someone.
entries.sourceEnglish: If you ever change your mind, we'll welcome you back!
I hope you find what you're looking for!

entries.context:
NPC dialogue option. No particular order for when you talk to someone.
// This is only if Sad Ass is STAYING on the Farm.
entries.sourceEnglish: *whimper* Take care, Comrade.

entries.context:
Repeater line.
// This is only if Sad Ass is STAYING on the Farm.
entries.sourceEnglish: *whimper*

entries.context: NPC dialogue option. No particular order for when you talk to someone.
entries.sourceEnglish: Heck, I know we ain't seein' eye to eye, but I'm gonna miss y'all...
You just standin' there to make me cry more are ya? Git goin'!

entries.context: At the exit, Slow Ass waits for Kick Ass so they can leave together.
entries.sourceEnglish: That was a b-beautiful sending.
She's in a b-better p-place now.
Come on, let's b-bring up the rear together.

entries.context: They leave and the camera heads over to Sick Ass's body where we zoom into her eye.
entries.sourceEnglish: Hey... It's stopped RAINING...
*COUGH*
*COUGH COUGH*
*COUGH*
*COUGH COUGH*
*COUGH*
*COUGH COUGH*
*COUGH*
*COUGH COUGH*
*COUGH*
*COUGH COUGH*
*COUGH*
*COUGH COUGH*
*COUGH*
*COUGH COUGH*
*COUGH*
*COUGH COUGH*
*COUGH*
*COUGH COUGH*
*COUGH*
*COUGH COUGH*
*COUGH*
*COUGH COUGH*
*COUGH*
*COUGH*
*COUGH COUGH*
*COUGH*
*COUGH COUGH*
*COUGH COUGH*
*COUGH*
*COUGH COUGH*
*COUGH*
*COUGH COUGH*
*COUGH*
*COUGH COUGH*

entries.context: Back in the Astral Plane, Sick Ass runs into Happy Ass.
entries.sourceEnglish: Oh boy. Another one. I almost didn't see you.
I'm doing the welcome ritual for Newbies today.
But there's been over 400 of you already... so I'm a bit... sore.
But it's really great that you're here. You're going to love it.
Make sure to check out the Concert tonight in the Pond of Hehehehe!
It's going to be 7 and a half hours of AWESOME.
Head on up over the hill!

entries.context: Sick Ass finds the Gamblers atop the hill.
entries.sourceEnglish: 401! I win! I told you we'd break 400 today.

entries.context: oof Jobs = Hoof Jobs = Hand Jobs?
entries.sourceEnglish: Ah shaddup, let's make another wager! Double or nothin'—Winner gets two 'oof Jobs!
Hey Newbies, we're betting on how many Asses are gonna fall from the sky tonight. You want in?
Sure! How about... 455?
You kiddin' me? Only fifty more? Fuggetaboutit!
What about you? You wanna bet?
*COUGH*
I knew she was the gambling type!
*COUGH COUGH*
No? Don't be a Loser! It's just a little bit of fun!
You like fun don't you?

entries.context: Players guess how many new Ass Souls will drop from the sky:
entries.sourceEnglish: So what's your bet? How many Newbies will drop?
WAGER
{$Number}? Are things that bad in the land of the livin'? Fuggetaboutit! Yeesh!
{$Number}, don't worry—a number that high? We won't forget.
{$Number}. Pretty reasonable.
For a Loser!
{$Number}? You gotta play big to win big!
{$Number}... Modest. Playing it safe, are ya?
Like a Loser!
{$Number}... Let's see if the numbers work in your favour!
{$Number}? Not in your life! We ain't had a night that low in weeks!
{$Number}. Sheesh. How low can you go?
Why do the Newbies always guess 69? Fuggetaboutit!
Head on down the hill!
Chances are—you'll see a familiar face or two!
We'll know the final tally after tonight's Concert.

entries.context: Sick Ass finds Old Ass regaling some Newbies with his stories.
entries.sourceEnglish: ...And my last words, after being given the Needle, were "Show the World the Power of the Ass!"
Wow. You are an inspiration, sir.
What can I say?
Hold on—Sick Ass? I would recognize that heavy breathing anywhere!
I was just about to introduce these Newbies to our beloved Astral Plane.
An open world where we Asses no longer have to suffer injustices or lament the struggles of our own existence!
Nice to meet you, Comrade Sick!
Not so fast, Newbie. In this marvellous place, we don't address our fellow Asses as 'Comrades'.
And Protests? We don't concern ourselves with 'Politics'!
Those are mere distractions from days gone by.
Allow me to provide all of you with the lay of the land:

entries.context: The camera zooms around to show the Astral Plane.
entries.sourceEnglish: To the East—the sensual orgiastic Flats of Hawweeeheaww.
To the West—the misty Hills of Hahiah.
Surrounding these lands are the Steppes of Hawawaw—the stomping grounds for the many Asses who love to race.
This is the Shithole. But we don't talk about that.
And this is the Pond of Hehehehe, where tonight we will make history with our very first TRAP MUSIC CONCERT. Be sure to attend!
There's a welcome rally happening at the moment.

entries.context: Camera cuts to a rally: Tight Ass addressing a group of newly arrived donkeys
entries.sourceEnglish: And that's why no Ass leaves the Astral Plane!
If you try to leave to get reassigned, what are you??
A LOSER!
Say it again! If you leave, you are a—
LOSER!
That's right!

entries.context: Camera runs to dialog between Old, Sick, Gulible, and another donkey
entries.sourceEnglish: I wish Trusty had been more patient when she arrived.
She could not adapt to the new life we have here...
But don't be scared, I know you will all fit right in.

entries.context: The other two donkeys run off
entries.sourceEnglish: Go explore and make some new friends before DJ Dope Ass's Concert tonight!
Actually, DJ Dope Ass was looking quite nervous when I last saw him down by the Pond.
Sick Ass, maybe you can help raise his Morale?
DJ Dope Ass is probably preparing his instruments down by the Pond. You can't miss him!

entries.context: Sick Ass finds an energetic Ass who wants to race.
entries.sourceEnglish: You're new! Wanna race? I'm pretty fast! You'll see!
Come on! You down? Let's go? Let's go!!
*COUGH*
Hell yeah new friendo!
Let's take the scenic route.\n
Let's go let's go let's go!
FUN!
*COUGH COUGH*
No? Shame! Ah well. I'll be here. Ready to race. Always ready!
Wanna race now?
Not even close! Hah! Maybe next time.
Or not! Who knows?
Wait. Practice is practice.
Wanna race again?
Wanna race again?
*COUGH*
Let's go!
*COUGH COUGH*
No? Shame! Ah well. I'll be here. Ready to race. Always ready!
WHEW. You're FAST! I like that. I really like that!
You're breathtaking! As in, I can't breathe! Whew!
UGH! I hate Humans because they never gave us the representation in their media we deserved.
Most of us are complex individuals with rich inner lives.
Like, we're not all stubborn and stupid, you know?
Hey Newbie. You look like you might be interested in joining our group.
Feel free to meet the membership!
I hate Humans because they beat me with a steel pipe!
We like to gather and share stories about how much we hate Humans.
We're HAW. It stands for "Humans Are the Worst."
Hey Newbie, you DTF? I like the way you smell.
How about now?
Again?
*COUGH*
*COUGH COUGH*
Geia sou, Newbie. I used to give tours to Humans around my beautiful home islands.
There was a very clear sign that said the weight limit was 100 kilos!
My boss shot me in the head because he didn't think I could work again.
One day my boss let a big Human sit on me and he broke my back.
Nihao. I hate Humans because I worked for them my whole life only to be killed with a sledgehammer, skinned, and turned into some 'delicacy'.
My death had no dignity.
LET'S DO THIS!
Booyah! I love that PURPLE STUFF!
What's good my fellow ASSES!!
Thanks for coming out tonight to my SET!!
Whether you're a freakin' Newbie or you've been here for a thousand years, get ready to let LOOSE!!!
Let me hear you say: Fuck Reassignment! I'm never going back!
FUCK REASSIGNMENT! I'M NEVER GOING BACK!
BOOYAAAHH!!
It's starting! It's starting!
Hey—Hey—Hey...
Where's that Purple Stuff? I thought you were gonna get me that Purple Stuff?
You know what I'm what I'm talking about, right?
Any chance you've got some of that Purple Stuff...?
*COUGH*
Ya you do! The best damn drug we got in the Astral Plane...
I'm supposed to start my set soon and I REALLY can't play without that Purple Stuff.
Help me out and bring me some will you?
*COUGH COUGH*
No? Oh my friend, it's best drug we got in the Astral Plane...
I REALLY need that Purple Stuff or I can't start my Concert!
I perished in the 1400s, so others hath at times described my methods as traditional.
Fancy a roll in my hay?
Hath thou still a dash of appetite?
But lo! You look ready for a History lesson!
What say thee?
*COUGH*
*COUGH COUGH*
If you want to talk to Wise Ass, just remember she's been here longer than anyone can remember.
Be respectful. Wise Ass knows the answer to everything.
You should be respectful.
Don't you love this place? We can really embrace our instincts.
How about now?
Want some more Furry?
*COUGH*
*COUGH COUGH*
I promise I'll be really gentle—if you want me to.
ACH! Protests! They're all for show.
It didn't take much to get those Peasants to Revolt.
I led a few impromptu insurrections in the 1300s. We nearly toppled the government.
We were simple village donkeys when the Humans recruited my herd to do supply drops in their wars.
They didn't take kindly to our pacifism...
But we held our ground and refused to be co-opted into the military industrial complex.
Merhaba. I hate Humans because during one of their wars they loaded my panniers with explosives without telling me.
I thought I was carrying water...
I thought I was carrying water...
Bonjour. I hate ze Humans because zey set my tail on fire just for one of zeir art movies.
Zey always valued zeir art above our lives.
Where are you going in such a hurry?
Time to chillax' dude.
And some killer drugs. Help yourself.
Only good vibes around here.
Hey, Newbie! You're from Trusty's old Herd aren't you.\n
She told us all about your Protest.
ACHH! Protests... they seem like great ideas but they DON'T WORK.
Every Ass here has had their share of Protests,

entries.context: There is a needed extra space before "Strikes"
entries.sourceEnglish: Strikes, Marches, Boycotts...
Some wanted better living conditions.
Those were the days, my friends. Those. Were. The. Days.
We don't ALL have to participate, right?
Oh that's a hard position to be in, I'm glad it's not me!
Some of us can just sit back and watch.
I'M HAVING AN OUT-OF-BODY EXPERIENCE!
NOW I CAN FEEL IT IN MY BONES!
WHAT THE FUCK, I'M WATCHING MY OWN BODY.
I led a Hunger Strike in the 1800s against my landowners.
Others here have said my Hunger Strike inspired generations.
...It killed me, but you have to stand up for what you believe in, you know?
Hey, you, Newbie! Are you on Shit Duty too?
*sigh* Nobody knows how much it takes to keep this place looking good.
*COUGH*
Looks like we're both missing tonight's Concert then!
*COUGH COUGH*
Then what are you doing here?? What about DJ Dope Ass's Concert?!
It's a shame—I would love to see DJ Dope Ass perform live!
I hear the Humans have some new ways of killing that don’t hurt.
Even if it doesn't hurt, you're still dead.
Well in my day, it was just the good old throat slit.
You ever have your throat slit in front of your loved ones?
*COUGH*
Liar.
*COUGH COUGH*
Didn't think so.
Whoa whoa whoa! Where do you think you're going?
You're not a Loser, are you? No one leaves the Astral Plane on my watch!
And I don't leave this tunnel for anything!
Except, of course, for DJ Dope Ass's Astral Trap Concert.
The Gods aren't gonna miss you. Haha.
My herd did a Boycott against long travels on the Silk Road.
Those were the days.
We even made a Barricade once and almost shut down the spice trade.
WHOA.
I can see how this all ends! You're glowing!
I can see four dimensions!!
G'day mate! Crikey, I hayte Humans cuz they shot me and family from thehr helicoptahs.
It wuz a real bugga, lemme tell ya.
We gonna have one helluva night—Look at all dem fresh Ass Souls!
PLEASURE:
CHAIN
